{{cpp/memory/allocator_traits/title|deallocate}}
{{cpp/memory/allocator_traits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|memory}}
{{dcla|since=c++11|constexpr=c++20|
static void deallocate( Alloc&amp; a, pointer p, size_type n );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Uses the allocator {{c|a}} to deallocate the storage referenced by {{c|p}}, by calling {{c|a.deallocate(p, n)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|a|allocator to use}}
{{par|p|pointer to the previously allocated storage}}
{{par|n|the number of objects the storage was allocated for}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

{{example}}
